author: echo_alice
content: Are you suppose to receive an invite to the EPF Google group via email upon submitting an application or upon acceptance into the fellowship?  I applied on the 2nd and never got an email

author: tmiychao
content: It will be send to all applicants at the same time when applications close

author: tmiychao
content:
Applications are opened till end of this week.
If you'd like to participate, don't hesitate to apply, here is the form https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1N-9PFEXW5KKqFH6NzArcqnI4YdTULh4xpmh6chRm8JI/edit
To learn more about EPF, check the program details https://github.com/eth-protocol-fellows/cohort-three/blob/master/program-guide/program-details.md and FAQ https://github.com/eth-protocol-fellows/cohort-three/blob/master/program-guide/faq.md
And feel free to reach out to me or <@914307919699406908> if you have any questions!

author: echo_alice
content: Appreciate it.  If you're in Berlin, have fun!  Happ Merge üêº
